Behnam Nabati

I am a passionate and dedicated Next.js developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies, including React.js, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. Currently, I am pursuing a Master's degree in Material Engineering at the Polytechnic of Turin, but my true passion lies in full-stack web development. My journey into web development has equipped me with the ability to build high-performance, scalable, and SEO-friendly applications using Next.js.
